Camberra is the Capital of Australia.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Indian Ocean.
The United States of America is located in Europe.
Africa is the second largest continent.
South Africa is a continent on planet Earth.
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
The Source of the Nile Sea is in Egypt.
Mount everest is the fastest growing mountain on Earth.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
Korea was the largest county in Asia before separation.
Russia is the largest country in Asia.
Australia is a continent and a country.
Saudi Arabia is the only largest city without a river.
India has the largest population in the whole of Asia.
Africa has more mountains than Asia.
the Sahara desert is the largest desert in the world.
The Dead sea is currently the lowest land on Earth.
Brazil is the largest county in North America.
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
Japan is the only single island and country on Earth.
